entries.npc_1_2: One of my fellow scientists has damaged navigational equipment and needs someone to bring them back to me here.  Can you help us out?
entries.npc_reward_1: Here you go, these bugs are very rare, and could be worth a lot if you can find a buyer.
entries.player_2_1: No thanks.  I've got other things to do.
entries.player_1_1: Sure.  I'll bring your friend back.
entries.npc_3_1: That's too bad.  Guess I'm on my own for now.
entries.npc_2_1: Thank you so much.  I'll make contact so there aren't any surprises.
entries.npc_1_1: One of my colleagues has managed to get lost just outside of town.  It would be a great help to me if you could get my partner back to this location. Can you do that?
entries.npc_3_2: Too bad.  If you know anyone who can help send them my way.
entries.otherescort: I don't think I'm the one you're looking for.  Perhaps you should be escorting someone else?
entries.dontknowyou: I'm sorry, but I don't know who you are and I'm not going to follow you anywhere!
entries.npc_takeme_1: Oh, you've arrived.  Ok, you lead the way back and I'll follow you.
entries.player_3_1: Why don't you upload your location to the datapad?
entries.npc_4_2: To be honest, scientists can be rather clumsy.  I'm not really going to say anything more than that though.
entries.npc_4_1: Something's wrong with the datapad, and it can't seem to be used to navigate anymore.
entries.npc_reward_2: Here you go.  I found this nice picture of the creature I was studying.  It's really all I have to give you though.
entries.player_2_2: Oh, my, I couldn't care less about you and your problem.
entries.cantwork: I understand you're already working for someone else.  Come back when you're done with that job.
entries.gotowork: I need you to finish that task I gave you earlier.  Ok?
entries.npc_2_2: Excellent.  I'll be waiting here, and when you've returned we'll make sure you get something for your efforts.
